name: Fight of Animals: Arena
overview: Meme animals strike again! The animalistic indie fighting game is back for more brawling, mayhem and madness. Players take on the role of cute meme animals trying to defeat all other combatants through intense fighting. Features: • 6 different stages • 2 game modes • Single-player or multiplayer mode • All 12 characters from Fight of Animals • Simple controls - all combos and skills can be performed by 4 buttons • "Double jump" and "Dash" features have been added • Now includes item and weapon drops *Nintendo Switch version includes unique items such as pineapple, xiao long bao, and harisen!
